original_text: And as soon as you heard the voice out of the midst of the darkness, while the mountain was burning with fire, you came near to me, all the heads of your tribes, and your elders.
korean_text: 산이 불에 타며 캄캄한 가운데에서 나오는 그 소리를 너희가 듣고 너희 지파의 수령과 장로들이 내게 나아와

sentences.original_text: And as soon as you heard the voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 그 음성을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: out of the midst of the darkness
while the mountain was burning with fire
all the heads of your tribes
